secret_rule: The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun that starts with the letter 'J'.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "jam" and "jelly.".

okay, based on the examples provided by the game master - "jam" and "jelly" - i will make my best guess about the secret rule.

given that both examples start with the letter "j", my guess is that the secret rule is:

the items must start with the letter "j".
